page.title: 15The Academy, Fraserburgh
page.content: In 1984/5{Fraserburgh Academy}had about{1640 pupils}aged 12 to 18. The school is a 6-year coeducational comprehensive and its{Rector, {Mr.J.B.Rankin}has a staff of over{150 {teaching and support staff}to assist him. The school is on{5 sites}in the town and an extensive programme of new {building and renovation}is under way to provide accomodation for all pupils at the "New" and "Old" Academy buildings on each side of Dennyduff Road, including{special provision}for {PE, Music, Drama, Art and Computing. Some of this new accomodation is already occupied. The pupils who attend the Academy come from country districts as far away as New Pitsligo and Crimmond as well as from Fraserburgh and its immediate surroundings.
